item.title: Using Git insteadOf to Automatically Replace HTTPS URLs with SSH
item.description: When working with Git repositories, you often encounter URLs in HTTPS format, especially when cloning from GitHub, GitLab, or other hosting services. However, if you prefer using SSH for authentication (which is often more convenient with key-based auth), manually changing URLs can be tedious. item.title: Batch migrate .sln files to .slnx format across repositories
